articles.headline: Making the switch to ACS
articles.summary: The Census Bureau's American Community Survey faced funding challenges but is likely to replace the long form of the 2010 Census.

articles.headline: Rolling hazards in rail cargo
articles.summary: Investigation into freight train derailments revealed ineffective track inspections and other issues that endangered residents.

articles.headline: ER gridlock exposed
articles.summary: Investigation into Maryland ERs revealed significant delays and highlighted a crisis in emergency healthcare.

articles.headline: Storm season
articles.summary: An updated database on U.S. storm events provides detailed information from hurricanes to tornadoes.

articles.headline: Endangered data helps find deadly mercury
articles.summary: TRI data was used to investigate mercury pollution from chlor-alkali plants, revealing significant environmental concerns.
